subject: Re: Vam motor
description_text:
Odd enough, the other ones also seem to be having the same issue now after using again last night. Could we exchange a whole set? Order info: Order # 113-7556808-7331444 Joseph Cicchetti 9 medieval way West Warwick RI 02893 Or, maybe I can exchange them for the Pro version and pay the difference? Joe Cicchetti Jr. On Nov 17, 2025, at 3:48 AM, support@simsonn.com wrote: ﻿ 
 Hi Joe, Yes, you can exchange this for a new one. Please provide us with your order ID and shipping address. 
 
 support@simsonn.com 
 From: Joe Cicchetti Date: 2025-11-17 04:39 To: support Subject: Vam motor Hello, I order a set of Vam motors of of Amazon and one of them seems to have died after a few hours of racing. I have trouble shorted using different sockets in the controller and the same Vam has the same issue no matter what. Can I exchange this for a new one? 
 Joe Cicchetti Jr.

conversations.body_text:
Thanks, are you sending me one replacement motor or all 3? im having
an issue with them all, maybe its the control box.

On Thu, Nov 20, 2025 at 4:51 AM support@simsonn.com
